thread.title: We Got Lisa Frank-Inspired Makeup Looks And Holy Crap It Was Cute
thread.title_full: We Got Lisa Frank-Inspired Makeup Looks And Holy Crap It Was Cute

author: Kristin Chirico, Devin Lytle
title: We Got Lisa Frank-Inspired Makeup Looks And Holy Crap It Was Cute
text:
ID: 10554358 2. Lisa Frank’s colorful world of magical animals was one of our very first style idols as kids, but what would it look like if we brought it into our ~adult lives~? The women of Ladylike decided to get themselves some Lisa Frank-inspired makeup looks to see if we could rock the colorful style as adults. Video available at: https://youtube.com/watch?v=XWHtfZINLas . BuzzFeedYellow / Via youtube.com ID: 10553668 3. So we were pretty excited to get our Lisa Frank makeup looks, if for no other reason than to make our old middle school enemies jealous. View this image › 
BuzzFeed ID: 10554329 4. Freddie decided to get a look inspired by Hunter the cheetah: Lisa Frank
Devin Lytle/BuzzFeed
  ID: 10553304 5. While Devin got a makeup look inspired by the unicorn: Lisa Frank
Devin Lytle/BuzzFeed
  ID: 10553340 6. And Kristin’s makeup look was inspired by the Ballerina Bunnies: Lisa Frank
Devin Lytle/BuzzFeed
  ID: 10553429 7. Then we wore our new looks around the office for the day and the responses were pretty great: View this image › 
BuzzFeed ID: 10553768 8. Some reactions were better than others: View this image › 
BuzzFeed ID: 10554325 9. But hey, we had a pretty *~*magical*~* time. View this image › 
BuzzFeed ID: 10553831
